news_header: Northvolt's battery factory has reported 47 incidents related to hazardous chemicals over the past three years.
news_text: According to SVT, the information is based on the factory's own records in Skellefteå, Northern Sweden. The factory handles chemicals that can lead to health issues decades after exposure. Police are still investigating whether the work environment is linked to the deaths of four individuals who worked at the battery factory, which occurred during their leisure time.
